segments.text: I see the woman standing there drying that plate with such focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing behind her, water just pouring out endlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely oblivious to the puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her shoes is already soaked, but she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the left, there's a boy climbing on this wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing nearby, holding out her hand for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking treats while the adult is none the wiser.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window looks so peaceful in contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one has noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
